view_distance.description: The distance at which the interactable icon is visible before it fades out.

stand_location_offset.description: Location Offset from 'node', where the player will stand when interacting.

start_enabled.description: [bool]When spawn, should it be enabled or not?

start_enabled_delay.description: When spawns, after how many second it should enable the interaction, -1 Indicates that the mechanism is disabled.

label.description: [string]Localization string describing the interaction in the HUD.

inactive_label.description: [string]Localization string describing an unavailable interaction in the HUD.

approach_direction.description: 2D angle between approaching unit and interactable, in the interactable's local space, that we center the interaction cone around

approach_angle.description: Half angle of the cone centered around approach_direction that we allow interaction in. If > 180 degreres, full circle is allowed.

screen_border.description: How far from the screen border interaction point should be. -1 can be interacted even offscreen

script_event.description: [string]Script event to be triggered on the interactable upon successful interact. - Require a Behavior Component on the the unit.

script_event_for_linked_units.description: [string]Script event called on linked units to be triggered on the interactable upon successful interact.

priority.description: This interact zone's priority when within range of other zones. Higher priority values are favored over lower ones.

blocking_injuries.description: Disable the interaction when the avatar have this injuries.

delete_after_interact.description: [bool]This will delete the entity after a successful interact.

hold_time.description: Hold time required to trigger this interact.

hover_icon_height.description: The in-world height offset of the interact type icon from the interact point.

interact_diamond_scale.description: The scale of the interact diamond.

auto_interact.description: [bool]If enabled, users will trigger this zone by just getting in proximity

show_if_disabled.description: [bool]If true, then the disabled UI will be shown when this interact is disabled. If false then nothing will be shown.
